headline.main: FORMER COOK PLEADS GUILTY AT SPY TRIAL; Becomes 19th to Do So, Leaving 14 Now Facing Charges

lead_paragraph: Richard Hartwig Kleiss, former chief cook on the United States Lines steamers Manhattan and America, pleaded guilty yesterday in United States District Court in Brooklyn to the charge of transmitting information about the United States defense effort to Germany.
abstract: pleads guilty to carrying U S data to Germany
